creator: De Vries, David
title: Elevation and plan of main entrance.  San Bernardino Valley Union Junior College, Library Building.  Also includes full size detail of mullion for iron gates.  Howard E. Jones, Architect, San Bernardino, California.  Sheet 5, job no. 315.  Scale 1/2 inch to the foot.  No date given on sheet (probably March or April, 1927). - San Bernardino Valley College, Library, 701 South Mount Vernon Avenue, San Bernardino, San Bernardino County, CA
